entry.title: Tahoe Tack Quick Change Bit Leather Western Double Ear Headstall
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tahoe Tack
Type: Headstalls
Price: 39.99

Tahoe Tack’s latest line of working headstalls has been designed with convenience and ease of use in mind. This new line of browband, slip ear, and double-ear leather headstalls all include new quick-change bit ends. This quick-change design features leather tab ends that are designed to securely hold your bit in place, but can be undone and re-done effortlessly in seconds for removing and changing out bits. These premium leather headstalls are ideal for multi-horse owners! Our headstalls have an adjustable 36-44” bit to bit length and have been designed to fit most horses weighing between 900 and 1250 lbs.

  • QUICK CHANGE DESIGN - this Tahoe headstall features leather tab ends that are designed to securely hold your bit in place when in use, but can be undone in seconds in order to change out or remove the bit.
  • GREAT FOR MULTI-HORSE OWNERS - if you use different bits for different horses or tasks, or use your tack for multiple horses, this headstall is perfect for you! This ultra-convenient, hassle-free, quick-change design makes swapping bits a breeze.
  • PREMIUM DOUBLE STITCHED LEATHER - our western double ear headstall is made from high-quality double-stitched leather that will last for many years with proper care and maintenance. This headstall also features stainless steel hardware.
  • DESIGNED TO FIT MOST HORSES - this headstall is sized to fit most average-to-large sized horses and breeds weighing approx. 900-1250lbs. This headstall has adjustable ear openings and a 36-44” bit to bit measurement.
  • AVAILABLE IN TWO COLORS - Tahoe’s line of quick-change headstalls is available in both Medium Oil and Dark Oil: two classic colors that are sure to complement your horse’s color and your other tack.

entry.title: Tahoe Tack Silver Texas Star Leather Western Horse Slip Ear Headstall with Buckle Bit Ends
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tahoe Tack
Type: Headstalls
Price: 34.95

Tahoe Tack Silver Texas Star Leather Western Horse Slip Ear Headstall with Buckle Bit Ends is an attractive new Medium Oil leather headstall that is a part of the Texas Star series. This new slip ear headstall features a flashy engraved 1” Texas Star concho on the side of the slip ear, as well as attractive stainless steel show spots covering the entire crown and cheeks of the headstall. This headstall was designed to fit most horses weighing between 1,000-1,250 lbs and has a 41” - 48” bit to bit length, and a sliding slip ear. Tahoe Tack’s Silver Texas Star collection also includes matching tack pieces such as a browband headstall, noseband, split reins, breast collar, and spur straps.


  • PART OF THE TEXAS STAR COLLECTION - this headstall is part of Tahoe Tack’s new Texas Star collection, which is composed of matching Medium Oil leather tack pieces featuring Texas Star conchos and stainless steel show spots.
  • DESIGNED TO FIT MOST HORSES - this headstall was designed to fit most horses weighing between 1,000-1,250 lbs and has a 41” - 48” bit to bit length, and a sliding slip ear.
  • SPOTTED TEXAS STAR DESIGN - this headstall features a flashy engraved 1” Texas Star concho on the side of the slip ear, as well as attractive stainless steel show spots covering the entire crown and cheeks of the headstall.
  • CONVENIENT BUCKLE BIT ENDS - this headstall features buckle bit ends which makes adjusting or changing your bit a breeze compared to traditional cumbersome leather ties, Conway buckles, or Chicago screws.
  • ONE YEAR WARRANTY - this product comes with a one-year limited manufacturer’s warranty that protects against quality issues and defects. To register your product, visit the manufacturer Derby Originals' website.

Measurements:

Bit to Bit: 41” - 48”

entry.title: Tahoe Tack Patterned Double Layer Nylon Western Browband Headstalls for Horses Available in 6 Colors
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tahoe Tack
Type: Headstalls
Price: 24.95

Tahoe Tack's Patterned Double Layer Nylon Western Browband Headstalls for Horses were designed to offer a more modern, attractive, and high-quality nylon headstall option compared to your basic, plain, single-layered nylon headstalls that are flimsy and unattractive. Our headstalls are available in six attractive patterns so that you can find the option that best suits you and your horse. Our line of patterned headstalls is designed to fit most horses weighing between 1,000-1,250 lbs and have a 16” browband, 40”-44” throatlatch, and 39”-47” bit to bit length. These headstalls are easy to adjust on the throatlatch and cheeks, and have nickel-plated Conway buckle ends to make changing bits easier and hassle-free. Be sure to check out Tahoe Tack's matching nylon overlay slip ear headstalls, nosebands, halters. bucket straps, and more!


  • DESIGNED TO FIT MOST HORSES - these headstalls are designed to fit most horses weighing between 1,000-1,250 lbs and have a 16” browband, 40”-44” throatlatch, and 39”-47” bit to bit length.
  • PREMIUM DOUBLE-LAYERED CONSTRUCTION - these nylon Western headstalls are made from heavy-duty double-layered nylon webbing, which is durable, long-lasting, easy to care for, comfortable for your horse to wear, and resistant to rips or tears.
  • PADDED BROWBAND FOR INCREASED COMFORT - our nylon browband headstalls feature soft neoprene padding on the underside of the browband to increase your horse’s comfort during use and promote a healthy fur coat.
  • FEATURES ATTRACTIVE OVERLAY PRINT - our unique headstalls feature modern and stylish printed designs such as Aztec, Chevron, Paisley, and more on the browband and cheeks of the headstall, which lets them stand out compared to regular plain nylon headstalls.
  • AVAILABLE IN SIX ATTRACTIVE COLORS - our headstalls are available in Blue Aztec on Black nylon, Red Aztec on Red nylon, Blue Chevron on Hurricane Blue nylon, Paisley on Grey nylon, Geometric on Hurricane Blue nylon, and Grey Floral on Hot Pink nylon.


Measurements:

Browband: 16”

Bit to Bit: 39” - 47”

Throatlatch: 40” - 44”

Tahoe Tack’s “Jewel of the West” collection was designed to dazzle in the show ring and is composed of only the most beautiful headstalls which are adorned with hand-tooled accents, conchos, show spots, crystals, and many other elegant features. These headstalls exemplify the beauty of fine western tack and are meant to highlight your horse’s features and allow you to stand out in the show ring.
